topic.title: Hello ZeroNet!
topic.body: I just started using ZeroNet. Anything that you guys would recommend me checking out? :)

1597342165_19hSmNkdqh3muSoLByP21Gnf6EAES.body:
> [erg](#comment_1_1NnnxvytFnbUTy8T4ARJ2nQQFm6w9sS7QG): i enjoy watching anime on http://127.0.0.1:43110/ehanime.bit

Thanks for the recommendation. I'll check it out. :)

> [krzysztof113](#comment_32_1Kzonk6v6ccFT3adLkCHoKJhGnoW1UhvY5): I wonder how you discovered it?

I knew tor and was curious what other similar technologies there are. I found it thanks to alternativeto.net
